APP.TITLE: Hilditch Image Skeletonizer
APP.SUBTITLE: Professional tool for image skeletonization with visualization of branching points and endpoints
APP.FOOTER: © 2025 Hilditch Image Skeletonizer - Advanced tool for image processing and analysis

FILE_UPLOAD.TITLE: Upload image for skeletonization
FILE_UPLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Choose an image to process with Hilditch algorithm. Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, BMP (up to 10MB)
FILE_UPLOAD.DRAG_DROP_TITLE: Drag and drop image file here
FILE_UPLOAD.DRAG_DROP_SUBTITLE: or click to select file from computer
FILE_UPLOAD.RESET_TOOLTIP: Clear all data and start over

PROGRESS.COMPLETED: Skeletonization completed successfully! Result ready for download.
PROGRESS.SUCCESS: Done! Skeleton successfully built with branching points.

RESULTS.TITLE: Skeletonization result
RESULTS.DESCRIPTION: Image skeleton with marked branching points and line endpoints

ERRORS.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Please select an image file (JPEG, PNG, BMP)
ERRORS.NO_FILE_SELECTED: Please select a file for processing
ERRORS.CONNECTION_FAILED: Cannot connect to server. Check if backend is running.
ERRORS.INVALID_FILE_FORMAT: Invalid file format or corrupted image.
ERRORS.FILE_TOO_LARGE_SERVER: File is too large. Maximum size: 10MB.
ERRORS.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
